### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20267 (Disable and fix tests for when BDB is not compiled by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, pl
This was already being done in #20267
The commit looked identical apart from the docstring, so I thought you wouldn't mind too much if this was merged first.
